Name: PCMatic SuperShield
Author: John Farley - john@pcmatic.com
Description: This PC Matic SuperShield Sentinel solution provides the capability to ingest [PC Matic SuperShield](https://www.pcmatic.com/pro/) process activity events with Microsoft Sentinel. It helps you gain visibility into what applications and processes are being executed on your endpoints, and which of those are blocked by SuperShield.
WorkbookDescription: PCMatic Workbook provides insights into PCMatic SuperShield logs.
